mapper.select: select o.id, o.order_id as orderCode, o.user_id as userId, o.trans_code as transCode, o.product_id as productId, o.amount, o.trans_status as transStatus, o.create_date as createDate, o.update_date as updateDate, o.discount_amount as discountAmount, o.trans_expenses as transExpenses, o.logistics_type_id as logisticsTypeId, o.logistics_code as logisticsCode, o.pay_status as payStatus, o.presending_time as presendingTime, o.supply_store_id as supplyStoreId, l.`name` as logisticsName, l.short_name as logisticsShortName from order_info o left join logistics_type l on o.logistics_type_id = l.id where o.id = #{id}

select o.id, o.order_id as orderCode, o.user_id as userId, o.trans_code as transCode, o.product_id as productId, o.amount, o.trans_status as transStatus, o.create_date as createDate, o.update_date as updateDate, o.discount_amount as discountAmount, o.trans_expenses as transExpenses, o.logistics_type_id as logisticsTypeId, o.logistics_code as logisticsCode, o.pay_status as payStatus, o.presending_time as presendingTime, o.supply_store_id as supplyStoreId, l.`name` as logisticsName, l.short_name as logisticsShortName from order_info o left join logistics_type l on o.logistics_type_id = l.id where o.order_id = #{orderCode}

select o.id, o.order_id as orderCode, o.user_id as userId, o.trans_code as transCode, o.product_id as productId, o.amount, o.trans_status as transStatus, o.create_date as createDate, o.update_date as updateDate, o.discount_amount as discountAmount, o.trans_expenses as transExpenses, o.logistics_type_id as logisticsTypeId, o.logistics_code as logisticsCode, o.pay_status as payStatus, o.presending_time as presendingTime, o.supply_store_id as supplyStoreId, l.`name` as logisticsName, l.short_name as logisticsShortName from order_info o left join logistics_type l on o.logistics_type_id = l.id where o.user_id = #{userId} order by o.update_date desc,o.create_date desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select o.id, o.order_id as orderCode, o.user_id as userId, o.trans_code as transCode, o.product_id as productId, o.amount, o.trans_status as transStatus, o.create_date as createDate, o.update_date as updateDate, o.discount_amount as discountAmount, o.trans_expenses as transExpenses, o.logistics_type_id as logisticsTypeId, o.logistics_code as logisticsCode, o.pay_status as payStatus, o.presending_time as presendingTime, o.supply_store_id as supplyStoreId, l.`name` as logisticsName, l.short_name as logisticsShortName from order_info o left join logistics_type l on o.logistics_type_id = l.id where o.supply_store_id = #{supplyStoreId} order by o.update_date desc,o.create_date desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select o.id, g.goods_id as goodsID, g.category_id as categoryId, g.goods_name as goodsName, g.description, g.spec, g.pic, g.tag, s.goods_info_id as goodsInfoId, s.price, s.stock, s.sale_count as saleCount, t.store_name as storeName, t.store_addr as storeAddr from order_goods_info o, supply_goods_info s, goods_info g, store_info t where o.supply_goods_info_id=s.id and s.goods_info_id=g.id and s.user_store_id = t.store_id and o.order_key_id=#{orderKeyId}
